senses.sense_definition: The front part of a horse's head, extending from the forehead down to the nose.

examples.text: The veterinarian carefully examined the <w>chanfrin</w> for any signs of swelling or injury.
A distinctive white star marked the center of the mare's <w>chanfrin</w>.

senses.sense_definition: A piece of armor or protective plate covering the front of a horse's head.

examples.text: The knight's horse was equipped with a steel <w>chanfrin</w> to protect it during the joust.
Wealthy noblemen often had the <w>chanfrin</w> of their horses set with precious gems.
